title: Noam Chomsky on being a good politician
description:
This event was held with an in-person audience of about 350 by the Young Democratic Socialists of America at Princeton University on March 31, 2023, 5-6 pm. If you would like to learn more about our work or join us in our efforts, please visit https://princeton.dsanj.org.

Facilitated by Hadi Kamara and co-facilitated by Bryce Springfield. Organized by the Princeton YDSA team.

Full recording: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7aKgQBig1RE
